description: A text field entry area, accepting integers only.

minAllowedValue.description: Cannot be submitted unless value is greater than or equal to this number. If not present, no minimum is enforced.

maxAllowedValue.description: Cannot be submitted unless value is less than or equal to this number. If not present, no maximum is enforced.

float.description: Converts the integer response area into a floating point response area, including a key to add a decimal

negative.description: Allows the integer response area to have negative numbers

value.description: Prepopulate the input box with a value.  If not present, no value set.
